name: Polatouche
description:
GAMEJAM PROJECT : Polatouche

Theme : Wind 

Duration : 5 days

Aim of the Game: To reach the Golden Nut at the top of the platforms 

Team :

  • Courteau Emmie (anim)
  • Szawkalo Konrad (anim)
  • Reynvoet Maxime (anim)
  • De Lombaert Damien (tech-art)
  • Meyer Elio (tech-art)
  • Cheniaux Léa (game-art)
  • Stasse Matthieu (game-art)
  • Decorne Nathan  (game-art)
  • Berthaut Alexandrie  (game-art)
  • Bouchayoua Monir (game-art)

Controls: 

- movement : AD/arrow keys on keyboard, left joystick/d-pad on controller

- glide: shift on keyboard, right trigger on joystick

- jump : space on keyboard, A/button south on joystick
